entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Rigolet
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers changing to 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning then 40 percent chance of rain showers in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. High plus 5. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
